data.title: LostMiner Android game
data.meta_description: LostMiner is an indie sandbox game with mining, crafting and exploration elements, mainly inspired by Minecraft, Terraria and Junk Jack. It has a side-view camera, mixing 2D with 3D (2.5D), polished pixel graphics with lot of personality, and great sound...
data.text:
LostMiner is an indie sandbox game with mining, crafting and exploration elements, mainly inspired by Minecraft, Terraria and Junk Jack. It has a side-view camera, mixing 2D with 3D (2.5D), polished pixel graphics with lot of personality, and great sound effects! You can do everything you want, in a procedural, pixelated and fully destructible world, with plenty of different biomes and secrets!
